pullRequest.body:
This generalizes the existing results for unital algebras to non-unital algebras by passing to the unitization within the proof.

We have to add a `StarModule` hypothesis to recover the unital case, but this is minor.

---

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks, and is labeled with `awaiting-review`.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10305820983/job/28527541927)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10305820983/job/28527542311)

In that Zulip thread, the issue is apparently the fact that we can't play with reducibility and so we're stuck. But this was back in February, and now we have `seal` and `unseal` -- do you think we could revisit the issue?

I've refactored so that these `synthPending`s are no longer necessary (although it's not my favorite solution, as things are a bit brittle). I don't see how we can use `seal` / `unseal` to help us here, but I've asked Anne on Zulip and pinged you in the message.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: star algebra homomorphisms between non-unital Câ‹†-algebras are contractive
